description: Create an agent that performs the back office automation required to onboard a new employee. This is not a chat experience agent but one that runs completely in the back office. It may however engage humans for approvals, exception handling, or clarification through human in the loop tools
use_case: The Employee Onboarding agent automates the back-office processes involved in bringing a new employee into the organization. It coordinates tasks such as document verification, account creation, and provisioning resources, interacting with humans only for necessary approvals or clarifications.

business_identifiers.employee_id: Unique identifier for the employee assigned by the HR system
business_identifiers.job_position_id: Identifier for the job position to which the employee is appointed
business_identifiers.department_id: Unique identifier for the employee's department
business_identifiers.manager_id: Identifier for the employee's direct manager
business_identifiers.onboarding_batch_id: Identifier for the onboarding group or batch
